data.name: Days with Evraco: The Blind witch in Blue Forest
data.detailed_description:
Ghost Girl Lasling

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1948470/_/


About the Game

This is a pure love AVG with suspense + dark picture book + adult content

◇
"Welcome to the Blue Forest, the nameless traveler.
Here, memory will be turned into pieces, played by blind guides"
You, who lost your memory, woke up in a strange blue forest.
You don't know who you are, you don't know where you going
Only the voice of "you must protect this forest" echoed in your mind, which seemed to be the only clue to solve your own mystery...

One day, in order to protect the forest, you were seriously injured and saved by the blind witch who lived alone in the depths of the forest—
The blind witch "Evraco", this mysterious witch seems to be closely related to your past...?

◇Game Features


Live2D animation
11 H animations
Live with an elegant and beautiful witch and purify the forest together
As the plot progresses, the mysteries of the world, Evraco, and even yourself will be brought to light

Endings: 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel I5/I7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sex animations, pictures, and text descriptions
